faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Questions and answers about base64 to text tool usage

q1.question: What is base64 to text?
q1.answer: base64 to text is a decoding method that converts Base64 encoded data to readable text, commonly used for transmitting binary data in text protocols.

q2.question: Why use base64 to text tool?
q2.answer: base64 to text tool can avoid special characters in text being escaped during transmission, ensuring data integrity.

q3.question: Does base64 to text support Chinese characters?
q3.answer: Fully supports Chinese characters, our base64 to text tool uses UTF-8 encoding to ensure correct processing of Chinese characters.

q4.question: What's the maximum text size supported by Base64 conversion tool?
q4.answer: Theoretically no size limit, but for good user experience, recommend single text not exceeding 1MB.

q5.question: How is data security guaranteed in Base64 conversion tool?
q5.answer: All Base64 conversion operations are completed locally in the browser, data is not uploaded to servers, completely protecting your privacy.
